trans-unit.source: Checks if TCA records with a FlexForm includes values that don't match the connected FlexForm value
Updates all database records which have a FlexForm field and the XML data does not match the chosen datastructure.
Force-deletes all records in the database which have a deleted=1 flag
Permanently deletes all records marked as "deleted" in the database
Finds files within uploads/ which are not needed anymore
Looking for files in the uploads/ folder which does not have a reference in TYPO3 managed records.
Finds (and fixes) all records that have an invalid / deleted page ID
Find and delete records that have lost their connection with the page tree.
Find all record references pointing to a non-existing record
Find all record references pointing to a non-existing record
Finds files which are referenced by TYPO3 but not found in the file system
Find all file references from records pointing to a missing (non-existing) file.
Update reference index
Setting this option automatically updates the reference index and does not ask on command line. Alternatively, use -n to avoid the interactive mode
Record uid
Page uid
Setting start page in page tree. Default is the page tree root, 0 (zero)
Depth
Setting traversal depth. 0 (zero) will only analyze start page (see --pid), 1 will traverse one level of subpages etc.
Dry run
If this option is set, the records will not be updated, but only show the output which records would have been updated.
Paths that should be excluded
Comma-separated list of paths that should be excluded, e.g. "uploads/pics,uploads/media"
Paths to process (default: uploads)
Comma separated list of paths to process. Example: "fileadmin/[path1],fileadmin/[path2],...", if not passed, uploads/ will be used by default.
1 day
1 week
1 month
3 months
6 months
1 year
